selected_skills.name: extract_numerical_values_from_image
selected_skills.purpose: Extract numerical data from the text region of the image.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to extract the numbers of brown SUVs and brown rubber school buses from the image.

selected_skills.name: compare_numerical_values
selected_skills.purpose: Compare two numerical values to determine their relationship.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to compare the extracted numbers of brown SUVs and brown rubber school buses.

selected_skills.name: map_comparison_to_option
selected_skills.purpose: Map the result of a numerical comparison to a multiple-choice option.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to map the comparison result to the correct multiple-choice option (Yes or No).
